options.content:
This dashboard features a comparison between product published at the following interfaces:
 - AUXIP
 - MPCIP

Discrepancies are displayed through the following indicators:
 - Total missing product count;
 - Missed products over time;
 - Pie chart view of product status;
 - Detailed list of missing products.

Information is available for each mission and each AUXIP/MPCIP managed by OMCS.

Tips:
 - Annotations are available on time series;
 - Mission and LTA service to consider can be selected in the upper bar.

The information displayed was originally taken from Product at AUXIP MPCIP  

Time reference for this dashboard is : sensing_start_date

Important notice : Tables & timelines can only display up to 10 000 entries. Please make use of filters to narrow down the retrieved data and get a more realistic view.

targets.query: satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND timeliness:$timeliness AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type:$product_type AND auxip_id: *

panels.description: Total Archived Products by MPCIP and also published @AUXIP

targets.query: satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND timeliness:$timeliness AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type:$product_type AND auxip_id: * AND MPCIP_${mpcip}_is_published: true

panels.title: Products Archived by MPCIP

targets.query: satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND timeliness:$timeliness AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type:$product_type AND auxip_id: * AND MPCIP_${mpcip}_is_published: *

satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND timeliness:$timeliness AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type:$product_type  AND auxip_id: * AND NOT MPCIP_${mpcip}_is_published: true

satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND timeliness:$timeliness AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type:$product_type  AND auxip_id : * AND NOT MPCIP_${mpcip}_is_published: true
satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND timeliness:$timeliness AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type:$product_type  AND auxip_id: * AND MPCIP_${mpcip}_is_published: true
satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND timeliness:$timeliness AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type:$product_type AND auxip_id: * AND NOT MPCIP_${mpcip}_is_published: true
satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND timeliness:$timeliness AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type:$product_type AND MPCIP_${mpcip}_is_published: true

panels.description: Total Archived Products by MPCIP and also published @AUXIP

targets.query: satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND timeliness:$timeliness AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type:$product_type AND auxip_id: * AND MPCIP_${mpcip}_is_published: true

panels.title: List of Archived Products

targets.query: satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND timeliness:$timeliness AND NOT (product_level:$product_level AND product_type:$product_type) AND MPCIP_${mpcip}_is_published: true

panels.title: Archived products- types not currently selected by dashboard filter

targets.query: satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND timeliness:$timeliness AND NOT (product_level:$product_level AND product_type:$product_type) AND MPCIP_${mpcip}_is_published: true

panels.title: List of Archived products not currently selected by dashboard filter
Archived products not currently filtered by current dashboard filter
